summary: After a few two many, Jack ended up in a little trouble in Whiterun. As Jack ponders the error of his ways in the Temple of Kynareth, you can relieve his boredom by taking him on a blood-soaked adventure. Jack is particularly deadly with an ale in his hand, or a two-handed sword.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v212/ElectraNemora/ScreenShot42.jpg[/IMG]

After a few two many, Jack ended up in a little trouble in Whiterun. As Jack ponders the error of his ways in the Temple of Kynareth, you can relieve his boredom by taking him on a blood-soaked adventure. Jack is particularly deadly with an ale in his hand, or a two-handed sword.

An essential companion for those lonely dungeon crawls.  Simply put the ESP file in your Skyrim Data directory and tick it in your mod manager.  If you are updating to an updated version of this file do the same thing and choose \'replace\' when prompted.

Jack should begin with level-appropriate gear (in his inventory, not equipped).

You will need: \'Apachii Sky Hair\' 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/

To make Jack look as young as in the picture I recommend: 
\'Final Younger Characters\'
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2332

Thanks and acknowledgements to Apachii and Toshiki.

***Update 21/7/12***
Added some personal conversation
You will need subtitles active to see Jack\'s replies to your questions
author: Erebus Red
